main.name: Owen Siu
main.description: Passionate about software development, building new products with cutting-edge technologies.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Owen! A full stack developer who love React, Node.js, GraphQL and MongoDB!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if you have got a great job opportunity!

education.school: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology

work.title: Prime Brokerage Tooling Strategist
descriptions: Migrating front office tools to ReactJS + dotnetcore
Use ReactJS with Redux Toolkit + ant design + tailwindcss to build frontend webapp

work.title: Software Engineer
descriptions: Frontend development on Client Management System from scratch.
Use ReactJS with Material-UI & Next.js to perform POC.
Perform application deployment through Docker.

work.title: System analyst
descriptions: Backend development on e-commerce platforms from scratch.
Use Node.js, NestJs, Express.js, Mongoose, MongoDB Atlas to build backend microservice and databases.
Setup GraphQL federation and GraphQL gateway for api connection. Setup test cases to ensure service availability.
Perform code review and refactor code to ensure code quality and maintainability.
Use Git and AWS code commit with SourceTree/Fork to perform version control.
Perform application deployment through jenkins, k8s to AWS EKS. Use datadog to monitor and analyze logs for debugging/system enhancement purposes.
Collaborate with team leads and scrum master to perform an agile development process. (e.g. Sprint planning, Retrospective meeting) Perform R&D to reduce risk on technical approach.

work.title: Senior Programmer
descriptions: Full-stack development on Internal System(ERP) and ESG Report Generator from scratch.
Use .NetCore to perform Spreadsheet summary Report Generating. Use ReactJS with Material UI for frontend development.
Use Graphql, React Apollo to connect API to the server side.
Use Node.js, NestJS, Prisma, MongoDB/PostgreSQL to build the backend server and database.
Use Git with SourceTree/Fork to perform version control.
Use Docker as the container to host the application.
Perform SEO analysis to improve search ranking.
Prepare proposals for government funding.
Communicate with clients to solve issues.

work.title: Programmer
descriptions: Full-stack development on web applications. Use AngularJS with Angular Material for frontend development.
Use Restangular to connect API to the server side.
Use C#, Node.js and SQLite to build the web server and database.
Use Git with SourceTree to perform version control.
Communicate with clients to solve issues. Host booth in HKCEC to introduce products.
